div.div:
Families, please click Read More for information regarding the district's response to the COVID-19 pandemic. All school campuses will be closed to students until at least April 24th.
Read More >

span.a: Scheduling Public Use of School Buildings
You are currently on this page - COVID-19 Information

td.p: Thank you for your patience and continued support as we communicate regarding the recent pandemic of COVID-19. It is our hope to keep you informed of our students’ educational plans during this time. Our number one priority is to keep all students and staff safe.

p.b: On April 16, 2020 governor Evers announced that all public and private K-12 schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

tr.td: Newly released week of April 13th. The information on this page includes staff contact for each grade or class, student/parent expectations, classroom expectations, resources, and weekly enrichment activities.

td.a: COVID-19 Family and Community Q & A

tr.td: Answers to frequently asked questions about the district's response to COVID-19, and educational expectations during the shutdown.

td.a: COVID-19 Familia y Comunidad Q & A en Español

tr.td: The Unified School District of Antigo Food Service will distribute free breakfast and lunch each weekday for students 18 and under. Free meals will be available for pick up from 10 AM to 1 PM and from 3 PM to 5 PM at the High School front entrance. Meals cannot be consumed on-site. Students may pick up breakfast and lunch at the same time. Free Meal distribution will continue throughout the school closure period.

The Weekend Backpack Program is still operating during this time of school closure. The bags can be picked up at the High School between 10 am and 1 pm on Fridays. As a reminder, free breakfast and lunch is also available to pick up daily 10 am to 1 pm, Monday-Friday.

td.p: We are so pleased to announce that Cirrinity has partnered with the Unified School District of Antigo to provide free public internet access at the following locations:

ul.li: Cirrinity's parking lot, 2628 US Hwy 45 in Antigo

td.p: Parents and students can access the WiFi from their cars at the above locations. The service is free and available during the Safer at Home order.
